data.message: stans if you come to greece for us here we will come and ull see us and feel our crowd as like ull never imagine and ull never forget cuz we love u and your music and youll live this crowd like other concerts youve have done in back time ,look maybe i know the problem is the money but think with your heart and spirit fuck the money do it for your love against us your greek stans money cant reach us there love always brings us together right?
